description: The National Maze Bank has been robbed by an armed robber.
The bank teller was held at gunpoint as masked robbers emptied the cash registers.
A jewelry store was targeted by armed assailants who escaped with a haul of precious gemstones.
During a late-night heist, armed criminals raided a high-end art gallery and made off with several valuable paintings.
An armed gang stormed a casino, overpowering security and stealing a significant amount of cash.
A group of armed individuals robbed a luxury watch boutique, fleeing with an assortment of expensive timepieces.
In a daring daylight robbery, armed thieves targeted an armored truck transporting millions of dollars.
A masked gunman entered a convenience store, demanding money from the terrified cashier before escaping on foot.

An armed robbery took place at a high-profile fashion boutique, where the thieves escaped with designer clothing and accessories.
